page.title: 15Arbroath,Health centre.
page.content: The new health centre in our patch was built very recently, and contains surgeries for three doctors' practices several clinics and a dentist. It is situated quite near to the centre of the town and from the outside it looks a very boring building but inside it is pleasant and modern. The receptionist told us that the doctors and patients seem to like the idea of all the different things being under one roof.Some people thought that they might not be able to see their own doctor but this is not so.Each doctor has his or her own area which is colour-coded .They are separate but it means that doctors can meet and talk more easily to each other.
